meta.name: description
meta.content: The School District of Collier County (CCPS) serves more than 47,000 total students in 29 elementary schools, 10 middle schools, 8 high schools, and a PreK-thru-12 school (Everglades City School).

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: education, collier, collier county public schools, ccps, collier county, collier education, naples, immokalee, golden gate, everglades, school, physical education, college
